name: Slimed (Anter)
description:
This game was made for the Dream Arcade Archive in 4 days.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move around
  • Mouse - Aim and shoot

Score system:
You get 10+combo_number each time you grab a box, and lose your combo if you get hit or the combo bar reaches 0. I didn't have time to make a leaderboard thingie so feel free to post your highscore in the comments!

Credits:
-Anter: Programming,  synthesized SFX
-Nako: Art
-Thundrabolter: Music
-Plague Thot: Acapella SFX
